bio.experienceSummary: I am a compassionate, patient, and engaging childcare provider who takes joy in caring for, entertaining, and educating children of all ages and abilities. With over 20 years of commitment to childcare, supporting children through their developmental journey is my life's passion. My journey in childcare began as a dual-degree certified educator in Georgia, specializing in special needs (across all exceptionalities) and art. The majority of my experience lies in working with toddlers to preschool-aged children and preteens, but my care has also extended to infants and children with a variety of special needs. I have taught children with special needs for over 20 years within the public school system, covering ages from preschool to high school, with a predominant focus on elementary and middle school grades. I have been certified three times in CPR and the administration of emergency care for choking, minor injuries, and specific conditions like seizure management.

description.originalText: Anyone who chooses to hire Christy to care for their children should consider themselves deeply fortunate. Not only is she someone with decades of education and experience working with a wide spectrum of differently abled children, she is also a kind and incredibly loving human! She is responsible, thoughtful and conscientious. Our toddler has immediately loved spending time with her and I have always felt nothing but ease leaving the house when he is in her care! Thank you so much, Christy!!!

bio.experienceSummary:
Hello! My name is Lydia and I am a recent Rhodes College graduate, where I majored in accounting and minored in Middle Eastern studies! I am coming home to Atlanta for the summer to work before I embark on a gap year of sorts to WWOOF in California (working on a farm woo!) and backpack Europe.

I will be available starting Monday, May 31st through the end of September. During that time I will be available to work 7am-5 p.m. each day, with varying availability at night. 

I have been babysitting/nannying for the past 8 years but am new to Care. com. I have experience with children ranging from infants to middle schoolers! I am also safe-sitter certified, which includes CPR certification, and am fully vaccinated.

If you have any questions, or think I may be a good fit for your family's needs please don't hesitate to reach out!

description.displayText: Lydia is a delight! She kids loved their time with her and kept asking for her to babysit for them again- a real treat!
description.originalText: Lydia is a delight! She kids loved their time with her and kept asking for her to babysit for them again- a real treat!

bio.experienceSummary: Hi I am Tyra and I am a current first year medical student persuing to be a future pediatric MD. I have worked at Georgia state university child development center , I also work at my churches daycare on Sundays and I am CPR and first aid trained in pediatric. I also was a assistant teacher at a local daycare where I'm from . I have a lot of experience with kids and I love kids , I am patient and I am willing to take time to teach and understand them !

I have 10 years of experience. I can help with Travel/Nanny/Caregiver. I'm experienced with multiples, children with special needs and one one childcare assistance. I enjoy spending time outside doing arts and singing with my kiddos. It's very important to be to help achieve milestones and track their progress. When in your home it's my pleasure to make home made foods for your infant or child to ensure we are promoting well balanced diet. I've been a cna since 2015, CPR instructor and certified dementia practitioner. If you are looking for overnight care, travel assistant or a nanny/caregiver in general let's chat.

description.originalText: Happy to find Kiana on here . We used her help last week and we have nothing but great things to say . She’s dependable , caring and is great with our kiddos .

bio.experienceSummary:
Hello,

I'm an oldest sister, teen babysitter, and forever care provider. As a progressive UN/homeschool parent, I facilitated volunteering, taught Shakespeare, and advised on university admissions transcripts. I taught for three years in a large public school system. I began my nanny career in 2005, and continue to work for many wonderful Atlanta families, providing exceptional care of their babies. I focus on newborn care, from birth through the first birthday, with select days, nights, overnights, and weekend care available.

description.displayText: Melinda was our nanny from the time our daughter was 18 months old until she started kindergarten at age 5. Melinda was like a member of our family. She was always providing our daughter with interesting educational experiences, and never did screen time with our daughter or spent time on her phone. We trusted her to fly with our daughter to our parent's homes, to spend the weekend with our daughter, and we even allowed our daughter to do a sleepover at Melinda's home. She is completely trustworthy--we provided her with a credit card and she was careful to keep receipts for all expenses. Even after she stopped being our nanny, we still asked that she care for our child on numerous occasions. She has even come to take our daughter out to dinner, unpaid!!! We paid a lot for a nanny matching service and you would be lucky to have her without the fee.

bio.experienceSummary:
Good evening! My name is Zykeria and here is a little about me. I have 3 1/2 years of experience as a baby sitter working with all ages. (Date Night Sitter, Daycare Teacher, Overnight babysitter, Camp Counselor,) I genuinely love entertaining children and putting smiles on their faces. I'm an 18-year-old Georgia State Student who majors in Early Childhood and Education. I bring a couple things to the table such as:
helping with homework and planning educational activities 
reliable and trustworthy
cleaning & cooking
laundry 
bottle feeding if needed 
routine preparation 
CPR Certified 
Own transportation 
loves to have fun but safety is 1st! 
love doing fun activities like arts and crafts. 
I also have a special love for animals! 
Please don't hesitate to book me as your sitter and reach back out to me! Thank you again for your consideration.

description.originalText: Zy’keria is excellent! She is such a sweet and caring young lady. She was excellent with my two kiddos.

bio.experienceSummary:
I have plenty of experience with children. Owning day cares runs in my family and I have always helped out at the day cares. I have been apart of the big sister programs and have also done plenty of volunteer work with kids. I have my degree in Child Development and I have worked in the public school system, daycare, private tutoring, and I currently work as a Nanny but my contract ends soon ( July 2020). I also have a tutoring and babysitting business. I am in the progress of starting my very own enrichment that has circle time, story time, yoga, and music and movement. Even with all of the different hats I wear I am still very flexible. Helping people is my passion, especially children. I look forward to working with your family!
I am also a children's book author.

Hello! I'm an experienced nanny with over 2 years of dedication to caring for children from newborns to 3 years old. I've worked with high-profile Hollywood families, gaining skills in newborn care, Montessori education, sleep training, and potty training. I also have experience fostering multilingual development (English, Spanish, and French) and managing toddler emotions. I'm certified in Basic Life Support and have completed courses in Elimination Communication, Solid Starts, Language Development Techniques, sleep training and complementary Sign Language. I offer personalized services, including long-term travel support, to ensure a comfortable and familiar environment for the child wherever they go. It would be a pleasure to contribute to your little one's growth and happiness!

description.originalText: Emilita worked with my family watching our 1.5 year old for 4 months while I was solo-parenting due to my husband being out of town for an extended time for work. With the circumstances at hand, my number one priority was a caregiver who was reliable and flexible. Emilita was that and so much more! In addition to always showing up on time and never needing to be reminded of the routine, she grew a strong bond with my daughter quickly. She was playful when it was time, but stern when necessary too. She taught my daughter many words, gestures, and tantrum coping mechanisms like breathing/counting. She has a heart for taking care of little ones and never let me down. Now that my family is moving away, I wish I could pack her in my suitcase and take her with me.

bio.experienceSummary:
I specialize working with neurodivergent children, but love working with children of all ages and abilities!
The goal of my care is always to create a fun and enriching space for children to grow and for parents to feel confident that their children are receiving the amazing care they deserve. I am very flexible when it comes to giving care and always want to adapt my style to how you parent while incorporating my knowledge of child development and researched-backed approaches. I'm also very creative, energetic, and positive, and I love coming up with new ways to be of help to my families. I'd love the opportunity to assist you and your family no matter the kind of care you are searching for!

-9+ years of nannying experience & 5+ years of tutoring with children of all ages
-B. S. in Psychology and B. A. in Philosophy
-Experience with children with emotional regulation issues, behavioral issues, autism, ADHD, and physical disabilities 
-Fully vaccinated

description.displayText: Madeline was great with our 6 month old! He warmed right up to her and she engaged with him so well. She was thoughtful and communicative. We're thrilled!
description.originalText: Madeline was great with our 6 month old! He warmed right up to her and she engaged with him so well. She was thoughtful and communicative. We're thrilled!

bio.experienceSummary: Hi, My name is Mykal . I'm a 26-year-old female from Memphis, TN. I have my Master's in Public Health with a minor in Bioinformatics. I have roughly 9 years of babysitting/ nanny experience. I'm patient and kind, and I enjoy littles, but I also have experience with older children! In my free time, I like to read non-fiction, try new restaurants, and do pilates. Can't wait to meet you!
